name: Alice's Gold
description:
Alice is lost in the woods, seeking its hidden treasure. Help her find treasures (gold coins) before the timer runs out.

This game is made for April Fools Day Jam submission.

Controls :

Arrow button for movement 

Spacebar for jump

Credits :

Art & Dev by nhnadhirah

Audio from Unity asset store (SFX by Dustyroom, BGM by alkakrab)
